item.title: Young people’s leisure patterns: testing social age, social gender, and linguistic capital hypotheses
item.description: We analysed young people’s leisure activities in order to identify their leisure habitus, discover how they combined activities into leisure patterns, and examine how leisure patterns were socially structured. We argue that the effects of age, gender, and language on how young people’s leisure patterns are structured are mediated by social class.
